title: A combination of generated hydrogen sulfide and nitric oxide activity has a potentiated protectant effect against cisplatin induced nephrotoxicity
content:
Publication date: 30 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 8

Author(s): Faria Khurshid, Javeid Iqbal, Fiaz-ud-Din Ahmad, Arslan Hussain Lodhi, Abdul Malik, Suhail Akhtar, Azmat Ali Khan, Marvi Imam Bux, Mohammed Younis
